rule.name: MU_rulePerformanceAndUsageAnalytics
rule.definition: load( local!aggregation: "Daily", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dashboardLayout"( /*label: "Rule Performance Over Time: rule!CRM_customerSummaryDashboard",*/ instructions:"Select an interval to group by and a date range for the performance evaluation", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Group By", choiceLabels: { "None", "Hourly", "Daily", "Weekly" }, choiceValues: { "None", "Hourly", "Daily", "Weekly" }, value: local!aggregation, saveInto: local!aggregation ), }, secondColumnContents: { if( and(local!aggregation<>"None",local!aggregation<>"Hourly"), { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "From", value: date(2014,5,1) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "To", value: date(2014,5,7) ) }, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "From", value: date(2014,5,1) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "To", value: date(2014,5,7) ) } ) } ), if( local!aggregation<>"None", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label:"Rule Performance Trends", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label: "Execution Time ("&local!aggregation&")", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Date", field: "date", data: { date(2014,5,1), date(2014,5,2), date(2014,5,3), date(2014,5,4), date(2014,5,5), date(2014,5,6), date(2014,5,7) }, links: { repeat(7, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(uri: "www.google.com")) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "# of Times Called", alignment: "RIGHT", data: {35,28,42,45,29,33,50} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Min (ms)", alignment: "RIGHT", data: {23, 22, 25, 22, 31, 65, 60} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Average (ms)", alignment: "RIGHT", data: {32, 25, 28, 35, 34, 66, 64} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Max (ms)", alignment: "RIGHT", data: {55, 69, 61, 67, 58, 70, 65} ), }, totalCount: 7, value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: 1, batchSize: 7, sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "date" ) ) ) }, secondColumnContents:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_lineChartField"( label:"Execution Time in Milliseconds ("&local!aggregation&")", series:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(data: {23, 22, 25, 22, 31, 65, 60}, label: "Min"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(data: {32, 25, 28, 35, 34, 66, 64}, label: "Average"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(data: {55, 69, 61, 67, 58, 70, 65}, label: "Max") }, categories:{ date(2014,5,1), date(2014,5,2), date(2014,5,3), date(2014,5,4), date(2014,5,5), date(2014,5,6), date(2014,5,7) }, yAxisMin: 0, yAxisTitle: "ms", xAxisTitle: "Date" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_lineChartField"( label:"Number of Times Called ("&local!aggregation&")", series:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(data: {35,28,42,45,29,33,50}, label: "Count") }, categories:{ date(2014,5,1), date(2014,5,2), date(2014,5,3), date(2014,5,4), date(2014,5,5), date(2014,5,6), date(2014,5,7) }, showLegend: false, yAxisMin: 0, yAxisTitle: "Count", xAxisTitle: "Date" ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label:"Performance Metrics", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField"( label: "", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Timestamp", data: { datetime(2014,5,1), datetime(2014,5,2), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,1), datetime(2014,5,2), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,1), datetime(2014,5,2), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,1), datetime(2014,5,2), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,1), datetime(2014,5,2), datetime(2014,5,3), datetime(2014,5,4), datetime(2014,5,5), datetime(2014,5,6), datetime(2014,5,7), datetime(2014,5,1), datetime(2014,5,2), datetime(2014,5,3) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridTextColumn"( label: "Evaluation Time (ms)", alignment: "RIGHT", data: {23, 22, 25, 22, 17, 65, 60, 23, 25, 22, 31, 65, 60, 19, 65, 60, 23, 60, 23, 25, 23, 22, 25, 22, 17, 65, 60, 23, 25, 22, 31, 65, 60, 19, 65, 60, 23, 60, 23, 25, 23, 22, 25, 22, 17, 65,
